description: After a late conversation at Bar 101, Daria enters emergency credentials and triggers a citywide BCI score reset, just as a wave of outage rumors begin circulating.
All BCI scores fall to zero; millions are instantly locked out of transport, housing, and services, with panic and confusion erupting across Stenograd.
Council factions splinter under pressure from the crisis; emergency units are activated and Innovators rush to restore partial order, but the city is fractured.
